info.title: Non-Associations API
info.description: API for viewing and managing non-associations for prisoners

tags.name: Legacy non-associations-details
tags.description: Mimics the NOMIS/Prison API interface for retrieving non-associations. **IMPORTANT**: Use new `GET /prisoner/{prisonerNumber}/non-associations` endpoint if possible

put.description:
Requires REOPEN_NON_ASSOCIATIONS role with write scope.
**Please note**: This is a special endpoint which should NOT be exposed to regular users, they should instead create a new non-association.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The non-association ID

schema.description: The non-association ID

403.description: Missing required role. Requires the REOPEN_NON_ASSOCIATIONS role with write scope.

put.description: Requires WRITE_NON_ASSOCIATIONS role with write scope.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The non-association ID

schema.description: The non-association ID

403.description: Missing required role. Requires the NON_ASSOCIATIONS role with write scope.

parameters.name: includeOpen
parameters.description: Whether to include open non-associations or not

schema.description: Whether to include open non-associations or not

parameters.name: includeClosed
parameters.description: Whether to include closed non-associations or not

schema.description: Whether to include closed non-associations or not

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Zero-based page index (0..N)

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The size of the page to be returned

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property,(asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

400.description: When input parameters are not valid

403.description: Missing required role. Requires the READ_NON_ASSOCIATIONS role.

200.description: A page of non-associations are returned

post.summary: Creates a non-association between two prisoners.
post.description: Requires WRITE_NON_ASSOCIATIONS role with write scope.

403.description: Missing required privileges. Requires the NON_ASSOCIATIONS role with write scope

404.description: Some of the prisoners were not be found.

409.description: Open non-association already exists or some prisonerâ€™s location is null.

post.description:
Requires DELETE_NON_ASSOCIATIONS role with write scope.
**Please note**: This is a special endpoint which should NOT be exposed to regular users, they should instead close non-associations.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The non-association ID

schema.description: The non-association ID

403.description: Missing required role. Requires the DELETE_NON_ASSOCIATIONS role with write scope.

post.summary: Get non-associations involving any of the given prisoners. Either person in the non-association must be in the provided list.

parameters.name: includeOpen
parameters.description: Whether to include open non-associations or not

schema.description: Whether to include open non-associations or not

parameters.name: includeClosed
parameters.description: Whether to include closed non-associations or not

schema.description: Whether to include closed non-associations or not

parameters.name: prisonId
parameters.description: When provided return only non-associations where both prisoners are in the given prison

schema.description: When provided return only non-associations where both prisoners are in the given prison
One or more distinct prisoner numbers

400.description: When fewer than one distinct prisoner numbers are provided or neither open nor closed non-associations are included

403.description: Missing required role. Requires the NON_ASSOCIATIONS role

404.description: Any of the prisoners could not be found.

post.summary: Get non-associations between two or more prisoners by prisoner number. Both people in the non-associations must be in the provided list.

parameters.name: includeOpen
parameters.description: Whether to include open non-associations or not

schema.description: Whether to include open non-associations or not

parameters.name: includeClosed
parameters.description: Whether to include closed non-associations or not

schema.description: Whether to include closed non-associations or not

parameters.name: prisonId
parameters.description: When provided return only non-associations where both prisoners are in the given prison

schema.description: When provided return only non-associations where both prisoners are in the given prison
Two or more distinct prisoner numbers

400.description: When fewer than two distinct prisoner numbers are provided or neither open nor closed non-associations are included

403.description: Missing required role. Requires the NON_ASSOCIATIONS role

404.description: Any of the prisoners could not be found.

parameters.description: The non-association ID

schema.description: The non-association ID

403.description: Missing required role. Requires the NON_ASSOCIATIONS role

patch.summary: Partial update of a non-association by ID.
patch.description: Requires WRITE_NON_ASSOCIATIONS role with write scope.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The non-association ID

schema.description: The non-association ID

403.description: Missing required role. Requires the NON_ASSOCIATIONS role with write scope.

get.summary: Provides content for a prisoner to satisfy the needs of a subject access request on their behalf
get.description: Requires role SAR_DATA_ACCESS or additional role as specified by hmpps.sar.additionalAccessRole configuration.

parameters.name: prn
parameters.description: NOMIS Prison Reference Number

parameters.name: crn
parameters.description: nDelius Case Reference Number

parameters.name: fromDate
parameters.description: Optional parameter denoting minimum date of event occurrence which should be returned in the response

parameters.name: toDate
parameters.description: Optional parameter denoting maximum date of event occurrence which should be returned in the response

204.description: Request successfully processed - no content found

209.description: Subject Identifier is not recognised by this service

401.description: The client does not have authorisation to make this request

get.description: Returns the dataset for the given report ID and report variant ID filtered by the filters provided in the query.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description:
The filter query parameters have to start with the prefix "filters." followed by the name of the filter.
      For range filters, like date for instance, these need to be followed by a .start or .end suffix accordingly.
      For multiselect filters, these are passed as one query parameter per filter with a comma separated list of values:
      filters.someMultiselectFilter=a,b,c

parameters.name: dataProductDefinitionsPath
parameters.description:
This optional parameter sets the path of the directory of the data product definition files your application will use.
      "This query parameter is intended to be used in conjunction with the `dpr.lib.dataProductDefinitions.host` property to retrieve definition files from another application by using a web client.

x-no-data-warning.description: Provides additional information about why no data has been returned.

get.description: Returns the dataset for the given report ID and report variant ID filtered by the filters provided in the query.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description:
The filter query parameters have to start with the prefix "filters." followed by the name of the filter.
      For range filters, like date for instance, these need to be followed by a .start or .end suffix accordingly.
      For multiselect filters, these are passed as one query parameter per filter with a comma separated list of values:
      filters.someMultiselectFilter=a,b,c

parameters.name: prefix
parameters.description: The value to match the start of the fieldId

parameters.name: fieldId
parameters.description: The name of the schema field which will be used as a dynamic filter.

parameters.name: dataProductDefinitionsPath
parameters.description:
This optional parameter sets the path of the directory of the data product definition files your application will use.
      "This query parameter is intended to be used in conjunction with the `dpr.lib.dataProductDefinitions.host` property to retrieve definition files from another application by using a web client.

x-no-data-warning.description: Provides additional information about why no data has been returned.

get.description: Returns the number of records for the given report ID and report variant ID filtered by the filters provided in the query.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description:
The filter query parameters have to start with the prefix "filters." followed by the name of the filter.
      For range filters, like date for instance, these need to be followed by a .start or .end suffix accordingly.
      For multiselect filters, these are passed as one query parameter per filter with a comma separated list of values:
      filters.someMultiselectFilter=a,b,c

parameters.name: dataProductDefinitionsPath
parameters.description:
This optional parameter sets the path of the directory of the data product definition files your application will use.
      "This query parameter is intended to be used in conjunction with the `dpr.lib.dataProductDefinitions.host` property to retrieve definition files from another application by using a web client.

x-no-data-warning.description: Provides additional information about why no data has been returned.

parameters.name: prisonerNumber
parameters.description: The offender prisoner number

schema.description: The offender prisoner number

parameters.name: includeOpen
parameters.description: Whether to include open non-associations or not

schema.description: Whether to include open non-associations or not

parameters.name: includeClosed
parameters.description: Whether to include closed non-associations or not

schema.description: Whether to include closed non-associations or not

parameters.name: includeOtherPrisons
parameters.description: Whether to include non-associations with prisoners in other prisons

schema.description: Whether to include non-associations with prisoners in other prisons

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Sort non-associations by

schema.description: Sort non-associations by

parameters.name: sortDirection
parameters.description: Sort direction (fallback depends on sortBy)

schema.description: Sort direction (fallback depends on sortBy)

400.description: Bad request; for example including neither open nor closed non-associations

403.description: Missing required role. Requires the NON_ASSOCIATIONS role

200.description: Returns non-association details for this prisoner

404.description: Any of the prisoners could not be found.

403.description: Missing required role. Requires the NON_ASSOCIATIONS_SYNC role

get.description: Gets summaries of all report definitions

parameters.name: renderMethod
parameters.description: Set this parameter to filter the list to only include reports for the given rendering method.

parameters.name: dataProductDefinitionsPath
parameters.description:
This optional parameter sets the path of the directory of the data product definition files your application will use.
      "This query parameter is intended to be used in conjunction with the `dpr.lib.dataProductDefinitions.host` property to retrieve definition files from another application by using a web client.

get.description: Gets report definition containing a single variant.

parameters.description: The ID of the report definition.

parameters.name: variantId
parameters.description: The ID of the variant definition.

parameters.name: dataProductDefinitionsPath
parameters.description:
This optional parameter sets the path of the directory of the data product definition files your application will use.
      "This query parameter is intended to be used in conjunction with the `dpr.lib.dataProductDefinitions.host` property to retrieve definition files from another application by using a web client.

parameters.name: dataProductDefinitionId
parameters.description: The ID of the Data Product Definition.

parameters.name: dashboardId
parameters.description: The ID of the dashboard.

This optional parameter sets the path of the directory of the data product definition files your application will use.
      "This query parameter is intended to be used in conjunction with the `dpr.lib.dataProductDefinitions.host` property to retrieve definition files from another application by using a web client.

get.summary: List codes and descriptions for enumerated field types

errorCode.description: When present, uniquely identifies the type of error making it easier for clients to discriminate without relying on error description or HTTP status code; see `uk.gov.justice.digital.hmpps.hmppsnonassociationsapi.config.ErrorCode` enumeration in hmpps-non-associations-api

reopenedAt.description: Date and time of the re-open, if not provided will default to today's time

reopenedBy.description: The username of the member of staff requesting the re-open, if not provided will use the user in the JWT access token

firstPrisonerRole.description: This prisonerâ€™s role code in the non-association

firstPrisonerRoleDescription.description: This prisonerâ€™s role description in the non-association

secondPrisonerRole.description: Other prisonerâ€™s role code in the non-association

secondPrisonerRoleDescription.description: Other prisonerâ€™s role description in the non-association

reason.description: Reason code why these prisoners should be kept apart

reasonDescription.description: Reason description why these prisoners should be kept apart

comment.description: Explanation of why prisoners are non-associated
comment.example: John and Luke always end up fighting

whenUpdated.description: When the non-association was last updated

updatedBy.description: User ID of the person who last updated the non-association

isClosed.description: Whether the non-association is closed or is in effect

closedBy.description: User ID of the person who closed the non-association. Only present when the non-association is closed, null for open non-associations

closedReason.description: Reason why the non-association was closed. Only present when the non-association is closed, null for open non-associations

closedAt.description: Date and time of when the non-association was closed. Only present when the non-association is closed, null for open non-associations
Date and time of the closure, if not provided will default to today's time

closedBy.description: The username of the member of staff requesting the closure, if not provided will use the user in the JWT access token

CreateNonAssociationRequest.description: Request format for creating a new, open, non-association between two prisoners

firstPrisonerRole.description: This prisonerâ€™s role in the non-association

secondPrisonerRole.description: Other prisonerâ€™s role in the non-association

reason.description: Reason why these prisoners should be kept apart

comment.description: Explanation of why prisoners are non-associated
comment.example: John and Luke always end up fighting

deletionReason.example: Created in error and removed on requested from OMU team

staffUserNameRequestingDeletion.description: The username of the member of staff requesting the deletion

PatchNonAssociationRequest.description: Request format for updating a non-association between two prisoners

firstPrisonerRole.description: This prisonerâ€™s role in the non-association

secondPrisonerRole.description: Other prisonerâ€™s role in the non-association

reason.description: Reason why these prisoners should be kept apart

comment.description: Explanation of why prisoners are non-associated
comment.example: John and Luke always end up fighting

content.description: The content of the subject access request response

OtherPrisonerDetails.description: Other prisonerâ€™s details for an item in a list of non-associations

role.description: Other prisonerâ€™s role code in the non-association

roleDescription.description: Other prisonerâ€™s role description in the non-association

prisonId.description: ID of the prison the prisoner is assigned to

prisonName.description: Name of the prison the prisoner is assigned to

cellLocation.description: Cell the prisoner is assigned to

PrisonerNonAssociation.description: An item in a list of non-associations for a given prisoner

role.description: This prisonerâ€™s role code in the non-association

roleDescription.description: This prisonerâ€™s role description in the non-association

reason.description: Reason code why these prisoners should be kept apart

reasonDescription.description: Reason description why these prisoners should be kept apart

comment.description: Explanation of why prisoners are non-associated
comment.example: John and Luke always end up fighting

authorisedBy.description: User ID of the person who created the non-association. NOTE: For records migrated from NOMIS/Prison API this is free text and may not be a valid User ID. Additionally, migrated records might use an internal system username. It can be an empty string

whenUpdated.description: When the non-association was last updated

updatedBy.description: User ID of the person who last updated the non-association

isClosed.description: Whether the non-association is closed or is in effect

closedBy.description: User ID of the person who closed the non-association. Only present when the non-association is closed, null for open non-associations

closedReason.description: Reason why the non-association was closed. Only present when the non-association is closed, null for open non-associations

closedAt.description: Date and time of when the non-association was closed. Only present when the non-association is closed, null for open non-associations

otherPrisonerDetails.description: Details about the other person in the non-association.

PrisonerNonAssociations.description: List of non-associations for a given prisoner

prisonId.description: ID of the prison the prisoner is assigned to

prisonName.description: Name of the prison the prisoner is assigned to

cellLocation.description: Cell the prisoner is assigned to

openCount.description: Number of open non-associations (follows includeOtherPrisons filter)

closedCount.description: Number of closed non-associations (follows includeOtherPrisons filter)

typeDescription.example: Do Not Locate on Same Wing

effectiveDate.description: Date and time the non-association is effective from. In Europe/London (ISO 8601) format without timezone offset e.g. YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS.

expiryDate.description: Date and time the non-association expires. In Europe/London (ISO 8601) format without timezone offset e.g. YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS.

authorisedBy.description: The person who authorised the non-association (free text).

comments.description: Additional free text comments related to the non-association.

offenderNonAssociation.description: Details about the other non-association person

LegacyNonAssociationOtherPrisonerDetails.description: Details about the other non-association person in NOMIS/Prison API format
